pullRequest.title: Added listModels() API implementation and a few samples
pullRequest.bodyText:
added samples for receipt extraction APIs.
added listModels() API implementation, samples, javadoc, and tests. fixes: #9976

commit.message: regenerate code with v4 auto rest
new autorest json file and option values
update based on new generated imple
